text: yemets’ihafu balebetochi hoyi! be’inyana be’inanite mekakeli tikikili wede honechi k’ali nu፡፡ (iriswami) alahini iniji lelani lanigeza፣ berisumi mininimi lanagara፣ kefilachinimi kefiluni ke’alahi lela amalikiti adirigo layiyizi newi፤ belachewi፡፡ imibi bilumi፡- inya musilimochi mehonachinini mesikiru belwachewi፡፡
